descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Crossplay with all major VR headsets.

A high‑octane multiplayer shooter built for players who want speed, strategy, and seamless cross‑platform action. ALVO brings everyone together in one shared battlefield. Your headset doesn’t limit you — it connects you. 
[media]
# Game Modes

Six modes offering distinct combat styles:

- Training – Practice against AI.
- Free‑for‑All – Every player for themselves.
- Team Deathmatch – Squad‑vs‑squad firefights.
- Search and Destroy – Tactical objective play.
- Hardpoint – Hold the zone.
- Zombies – Survive waves with your squad.

# Accessibility

ALVO is built to adapt to you. Choose between manual or button reloads, customize your HUD elements, and even change the entire UI color theme. Play sitting or standing — your comfort, your style.
[media]
# Weapons & Equipment

Progress through the ranks to unlock new gear and expand your arsenal. Customize your loadouts with:
- Scopes & reticles
- Lasers & attachments
- Weapon skins
- Trinkets & cosmetic upgrades

# Perks

Equip up to two perks to shape your playstyle. Need more stamina? ammo? explosive resistance? Build the advantage that fits your approach to combat.

[media]
# Killstreaks

Earn consecutive kills to unleash powerful support options. Trigger different Killstreaks at 3, 5, and 7 kills to turn the tide of battle.
[media]
# Maps

ALVO features 14 core maps plus 4 day/night variants, from tight urban streets to wide‑open arenas built for fast VR combat.
[media]

Community‑made maps are supported through private matches, expanding the fight even further.

[media]
